publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3115 Mike Pringle: Thank You to the Forestry Commissionâ€”That the Parliament thanks the Forestry Commission for its generosity in providing a free Christmas tree to all MSPs for donation to a local charity or organisation of their choice; notes the hard work of all the staff at Drum Court sheltered housing complex in south Edinburgh; congratulates them and all the cheerful residents on their successful 30th anniversary year, and trusts that they are enjoying their donated tree. Supported by: Jamie Hepburn*, Alex Neil*, Mary Scanlon*, Alasdair Allan*, Margaret Smith*, Bill Kidd*, George Foulkes*, Gil Paterson*, Elizabeth Smith*, Jim Hume*, Liam McArthur*, Trish Godman*, Bob Doris*, Jim Tolson*, Robin Harper*, Hugh Henry*
S3M-3115 Thank You to the Forestry Commission (lodged on 16 December 2008) Stuart McMillan*
